game.name: MEMOREUM
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: MEMOREUM is a VR sci-fi action horror campaign. The Ichor Infection has taken over the last ship of humanity. You are Dr. Otto Hudson, fighting to unravel the mystery behind the outbreak as your fragmented mind slips from reality.
